verses.text: Ayton wal swach'k'olal Dios t'ayonh a onh israel onh tik, mach onh tojol yaj ko pensar.
Ixocto wal yak' jab'ocxo, in telwi. Jab'xonhej maj in b'atcan t'a skal chukal,
yujto ix wiloch in k'ol t'a heb' ak'umtac yet' heb' anima chuk ayic ix wilani to te wach'nhej yaj heb'.
Malaj chamel sja t'a yib'anh heb' swila'. Tek'an yaj heb', malaj syab' syail sniwanil heb'.
Malaj yaelal sja t'a yib'anh heb'. Malaj stzapan majanil heb' sja t'a yib'anh.
Yuj chi' te wach' syutej heb' sb'oan sb'a yuj sch'oxanel yak'umtaquil yet' pax yixtan anima.
Ijan wal maxtzac checlaj yol sat heb' yuj sb'ak'echal. Yelxo wal te chuk spensar heb'.
B'uchumtac slolon heb', syik'chaanh sb'a heb'. Malaj jab'oc sq'uixwelal heb' yak'an owal, syixtan anima heb'.
Anhej b'uchwal lolonel syal heb' d'ha Dios aj satcha’anh. Syalanpax chuk heb' t'a anima t'a sat lu'um tik.
Yuj chi' tz'och tzak'an heb' anima yuj heb', schaan yab' heb' anima chi' jantac chukal syal heb'.
Snaan heb' icha tik: ¿Tas ol yutoc Dios Ek'to t'a yib'anh smasanil yojtacanel tas sco k'ulej tik? ¿Tocwal syil tas tzuji tik? xchi heb'.
Ilecnab' wal juntzanh anima chuk tik, malaj tas tz'ik'an heb', ste q'uib'nhej chaanh sb'eyumal heb'.
Palta a inxo tik, malaj tas ix wak' ganar wach'chom ix in yamoch waan in pensar t'a chukal, wach'chom wach' ix wutej in b'eyb'al.
Cotac skal tz'ak'ji in yaelal, ichato tzin mak'ji. Junjun q'uinhib'alil swik'an tz'uum.
Mamin, q'uinaloc ix wal icha syal heb' chi', ix am wixtej heb' wetchonhab', a onh ton a chonhab' onh tik.
Ix snib'ej in k'ool to snachajel jun tik wuuj, palta tonhej ix somchaj in pensar yuj.
Ato wal yic ix in och t'a a cajnub', ichato chi' ix nachajel wuuj tas ol cotcan t'a yib'anh heb' chuk chi'.
Toxo ix ak'em linhan heb' t'a yax nhelek'tac yic stelwi heb'. Tzecancanb'at heb' b'aj ol ixtaxoc.
Elanhchamel ol aj satel heb'. D'a skal xivk'olal ol lajwoccanel heb'.
Ach Mamin Vajalil, icha tz'aj sat swayich junok mach t'a sk'ool ayic tz'el swayanh, icha chi' ol aj a paticanel heb' chuk chi' ayic ol a naank'e tas ol aj heb'.
Ayic manto nachajel-laj jun tik wuuj, ix in te cusi, ix och pitz'an syail t'a in pixan.
Ha yuj in quistalil maj nachajel-laj wuuj, yuj chi' lajan ix wutej in b'ha t'a ichanh icha junok nok' nok' malaj spensar.
Palta jun, ayinnhej ek' ed'oc, quetzb'il in uuj.
Tzin a k'ayb'an t'a tas swutej in b'a. Axo t'a slajwub', ol in a cha t'a a wach'ilal.
Malaj junocxo mach ayek' t'a satcha’anh b'aj swak'och in pensar, a achnhej toni. Ayic snachajel wuuj to ayach ek' wed'oc, manhxalaj tas tzin nib'ejoch t'a sat lu'um tik.
Wach'chom spax yip in niwanil tik, stacpax in k'ool, palta a achxo ach Dios, Vipumal aji, anhej t'ayach ay masanil tas snib'ej in k'ool.
Ha heb' syik'el sb'a t'ayach, ol cham heb'. Ol a satel masanil heb' syik'el sb'a chi'.
Palta a in wal tik Mamin Jehová Vajalil, tzin nitzoch in b'ha t'a a tz'ey yujto anhej jun chi' niwan yelk'och t'ayin. Tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool yic swalel jantac tas ix a k'ulej.
